title: We should have the "Old League" game mode
body:
League is a rather old game now, and I feel like a lot of the players would really like it if we have a game mode where we bring back certain old elements of the game. We could do this in a number of ways. I think it would be really cool to be able to play champions before their rework. This includes relatively new reworks like {{champion:83}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:41}}{{champion:98}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:78}}  as well as older ones like {{champion:14}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:4}} . We could also bring back old items, spells, and even jungle monsters. 

By no means am I saying that the old users are dissatisfied with the current state of the game or that the changes it went through were negative. The point is that old users miss the old game and would highly appreciate it if we could have access to some of it.

replies.body: While I'd love to enjoy AP Yi and DFGaren one more time, it's unlikely that they'll actually create a legacy server. Now if you're talking a legacy rotating game mode, that actually sounds like a good idea. Give some of the newbies a chance to experience some of the older memes firsthand. They'd have to make some kind of a decision on when they go back to, but I'm sure they could pick one of a couple arbitrary points, assuming they've still got all the old code/stats/kits available.
